Level

  • Wizard

    Shows great mastery of the most difficult skills. The Wizard gains his strength by solving the hardest challenges. The wizard also grows in strength by solving problems for lesser powers

  • Master

    Shows strong knowledge of his skills. He demonstrates resilience, effort and helpfulness. The Master grows in strength by completing all challenges and succeeding in at least half of the hardest challenges

  • Apprentice

    You will get upgraded to Apprentice when you earn 1000 Skill points!

  • Rookie

    The rookie is the first level. Work hard on viewing content and take your tests seriously. You will get upgraded to Apprentice when you earn 1000 Skill points!
